meanings.definition: A type of sweet almond-flavored liqueur.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy sipping on amarettos after dinner.
meanings.sent2: The bartender served me two amarettos in elegant glasses.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone wanted a taste of the delicious amarettos.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of amarettos filled the room, creating a warm atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The amarettos sparkled in the dim light, tempting me with their sweetness.

meanings.definition: Plural form of amaretto, referring to multiple bottles or servings of the liqueur.
meanings.sent1: The store stocked various amarettos from different brands.
meanings.sent2: We bought three amarettos for the party to ensure there was enough for everyone.
meanings.sent3: The friends decided to have a competition to see who could drink the most amarettos.
meanings.sent4: The shelves were filled with amarettos of all shapes and sizes, like a colorful display.
meanings.sent5: The clinking of the amarettos being poured into glasses signaled the start of the celebration.
